full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: GSIN 4810 Valve, Kit

**Procurement Details:**
* **Procurement Reference Number**: cb-6946-16761915
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-241749/A
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Deliverables:**
The National Defence Department requires the delivery of a variety of valves, kits, and related components to two Canadian military bases: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. For a comprehensive list of required items, please refer to the attached tender documents.

**Important Dates:**

* **Notice of Proposed Procurement**: 2023-07-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-14T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: Specified in the tender documents

**Tender Status:**
This procurement has been cancelled.

**Attachments:**

* Tender Notice in English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6946/w8482-241749---rfp---en.pdf>
* Tender Notice in French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6946/w8482-241749---rfp---fr.pdf>
* Amendment 001 (English)
* Amendment 001 (French)
* Amendment 002 (English)
* Amendment 002 (French)

**Contact Information:**
Christopher Cauchi, Contracting Officer
christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
(555) 555-5555

Please note that this is an official Government of Canada procurement. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The tender documents will be posted on the Canada Buys website and may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Suppliers must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.�ت
